events.message: Customer filed a claim reporting a rear-end car accident that occurred on 2024-04-28 involving their vehicle and another on the highway.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the details specifying a collision between two vehicles.
An agent specializing in vehicle collisions was assigned to handle the case promptly to streamline communication and support.
Confirmation message sent to the claimant acknowledging receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining next steps.
Request sent to customer for accident photos, police report, and vehicle damage estimate to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted requested documents including police report, photos of car damage, and repair shop estimate.
Investigation initiated to verify the collision details and ensure claim validity with the help of submitted evidence.
The investigation concluded confirming the claim is valid and that the damage reported matches the accident circumstances.
Claim settlement proposed to the customer based on damage estimate and insurance policy coverage terms.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and confirmed agreement to proceed with repair payments.
Official approval granted for the auto accident claim following customer's acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for the repair costs issued to the customerâ€™s chosen auto repair shop as per the approved settlement.
Claim officially closed after successful payment and confirmation of repair work completion from the customer.
Case files and records archived for future reference and compliance following closure of the auto accident claim.
